variation.name: No declared arc cyles with no cycles
variation.description: 207.01 DecArcCyclesNN.xsd declares an arcrole that does not allow any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesNN_definition.xml linkbase.

variation.name: No declared arc cyles with undirected cycles exist
variation.description: 207.02 DecArcCyclesNU.xsd declares an arcrole that does not allow any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesNU_definition.xml linkbase which contains an undirected cycle.

variation.name: No declared arc cyles with directed cycles exist
variation.description: 207.03 DecArcCyclesND.xsd declares an arcrole that does not allow any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesND_definition.xml linkbase which contains a directed cycle.

variation.name: No declared arc cyles with undirected cycles through extension
variation.description: 207.04 DecArcCyclesNUE.xsd declares an arcrole that does not allow any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesNUE_definition.xml linkbase which in itself contains no cycles. However, via the DTS DecArcCyclesNUE2.xsd and DecArcCyclesNUE2_definition.xml are also discovered. The combined linkbases form a network containing an undirected cycle.

variation.name: No declared arc cyles with prohibited undirected cycles through extension
variation.description: 207.05 DecArcCyclesNE.xsd declares an arcrole that does not allow any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesNE_definition.xml linkbase which in itself contains an undirected cycle. However, via the DTS DecArcCyclesNE2.xsd and DecArcCyclesNE2_definition.xml are also discovered. DecArcCyclesNE2_definition.xml prohibits the arcs that form the undirected cycle.

variation.name: Declared undirected declared arc cyles
variation.description: 207.06 DecArcCyclesUN.xsd declares an arcrole that allows undirected cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesUN_definition.xml linkbase which contains no cycles.

variation.name: Declared undirected declared arc cyles with undirected cycles
variation.description: 207.07 DecArcCyclesUU.xsd declares an arcrole that allows undirected cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesUU_definition.xml linkbase which contains an undirected cycle.

variation.name: Declared undirected declared arc cyles with directed cycles
variation.description: 207.08 DecArcCyclesUD.xsd declares an arcrole that allows undirected cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesUD_definition.xml linkbase which contains a directed cycle.

variation.name: Declared unidrected cyles with undirected cycles through extension
variation.description: 207.09 DecArcCyclesUUE.xsd declares an arcrole that allows undirected cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesUUE_definition.xml linkbase which in itself contains no cycles. However, via the DTS DecArcCyclesUUE2.xsd and DecArcCyclesUUE2_definition.xml are also discovered. The combined linkbases form a network of arcs that have an undirected cycle.

variation.name: Declared unidrected cyles with directed cycles through extension
variation.description: 207.10 DecArcCyclesUDE.xsd declares an arcrole that allows undirected cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesUDE_definition.xml linkbase which in itself contains no cycles. However, via the DTS DecArcCyclesUDE2.xsd and DecArcCyclesUDE2_definition.xml are also discovered. The combined linkbases form a network of arcs that have a directed cycle.

variation.name: Declared any cyles with no cycles
variation.description: 207.11 DecArcCyclesDN.xsd declares an arcrole that allows any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesDN_definition.xml linkbase.

variation.name: Declared any cyles with undirected cycles
variation.description: 207.12 DecArcCyclesDU.xsd declares an arcrole that allows any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesDU_definition.xml linkbase which contains an undirected cycle.

variation.name: Declared any cyles with directed cycles
variation.description: 207.13 DecArcCyclesDD.xsd declares an arcrole that allows any cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesDD_definition.xml linkbase which contains a directed cycle.

variation.name: Declared no cycles, with two parents sharing two children
variation.description: 207.14 DecArcCyclesNU2.xsd declares an arcrole that does not allow cycles. It references the DecArcCyclesNU2_definition.xml linkbase which contains a structure where A and Z are the parents of both B and C but there are no other cycles, directed or undirected. This forms an undirected cycle.
